definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: My grandma is very good at weaving baskets with bamboo.
sentences.chinese: 我的艿艿十分擅长用竹子编篮筐。

sentences.english: Guangning is the home of bamboo and famous for its picturesque scenery .
sentences.chinese: 广宁是著名的竹子之乡，以优美的自然景色而出名。

sentences.english: He hedged about his garden with bamboo.
sentences.chinese: 他用竹子把菜园围起来。

sentences.english: I want to make a penholder with this bamboo.
sentences.chinese: 我要把这根竹子做成一个笔筒。

sentences.english: Using the paws, he chew the bamboo very slowly with his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 用爪子，他慢慢的咀嚼竹子非常他口中所出的声音。

sentences.english: Making bamboo beer requires a process of fermenting the rich natural sugars of the plant’s sap.
sentences.chinese: 酿竹子酒需要将竹子汁液中富含的天然糖分发酵。

sentences.english: Making bamboo beer requires a process of fermenting the rich natural sugars of the plant’s sap.
sentences.chinese: 酿竹子酒需要将竹子汁液中富含的天然糖分发酵。

sentences.english: "Bamboo Willow" have no relation with bamboo at all but were so named for the remarkable growth properties.
sentences.chinese: 以其向高向上的生长形态酷似竹子，被命名为竹柳。

sentences.english: Wen Tong loved bamboo so much he had grown various types of bamboo around his house .
sentences.chinese: 文同在自己家的房前屋后种上各种各样的竹子。

sentences.english: The bamboo resources in Sanming area.
sentences.chinese: 三明市竹子资源的调查研究。

sentences.english: Bamboo can be made into fishing poles.
Pass to carry on to the bamboo applied condition objective analysis and evaluation.
sentences.chinese: 通过对竹子应用状况进行客观分析与评价。

sentences.english: Yet nothing came from the bamboo seed.
sentences.chinese: 可是竹子的种子却毫无动静。

sentences.english: Nonetheless, after another six months, the bamboos soared to 100 feet high.
sentences.chinese: 但是，仅在6个月之后，竹子就长到100英尺高了。

sentences.english: Even the scabbards for the weapons were constructed from bamboo.
sentences.chinese: 甚至连刀鞘也是竹子做的。

sentences.english: I know your hometown is China. So I bring you some bamboo.
sentences.chinese: 我知道你老家在中国，所以我给你带了些竹子来。

definition: moso bamboo (Phyllostachys edulis), used as timber etc
thin bamboo strips used for basket weaving
Masson pine (Pinus massoniana, Chinese red pine, horsetail pine)
